column4: I've had the generic kernel crash on my machine -- so I use rt instead.
has anyone else notice instabilities with the generic kernel -- just locking up?
yeah I have, I recently did an install and experienced similiar problems
so I am not just going nuts -- Ubuntu has a QA problem!
i had similiar experience with trying to install legacy nvidia drivers using Envy and trying to do exactly what you tried

yes -- all kinds of nasty issues with legacy nvidia drivers -- found out the hard way that the restricted drivers are directly tied to the specific kernels. The dependency mechanism doesn't catch this, but should.
